Teaching

Master in Particle Physics and Physics of the Cosmos

  • M1992: Programming in a Scientific Environment (2020-2022)

    Introduction to Python, object-oriented programming, usage of numeric libraries, optimization, code parallelization and specific applications to astrophysical problems with Python.
